data.eml:eml: A new species of the family Trochometridiidae (Acari: Heterostigmatina) associated with Paulusiella sp. (Coleoptera: Elateridae) from Iran

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mortazavi, Abdolazim, Hajiqanbar, Hamidreza, Saboori, Alireza (2011): A new species of the family Trochometridiidae (Acari: Heterostigmatina) associated with Paulusiella sp. (Coleoptera: Elateridae) from Iran. Zootaxa 2746: 57-68, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.201252
